title: Verify Installation Against Specifications
description: A quality inspector must verify that the newly installed windows match the model number specified in the project's technical specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the technical specification document for windows.
tasks.expected_outcome: The 'Section 085113 - Aluminum Windows' spec is retrieved.

tasks.description: Physically check the model number on one of the installed windows.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model number on the window is noted.

tasks.description: Compare the installed model number with the one required in the specification document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the installed windows match the specification.
